name: Newt's Venture
description:
Increase the music with the up arrow key and decrease the volume with the down arrow key.

Press the exit key to quit the game.

The music will be uploaded to my YT channel soon.

I would've added sound effects but something went wrong and finding a good download for the sound effects I want is way too tough.

I had to submit this to the Go Godot Game Jam early because I am going out of town tomorrow.  Even though I had a tighter deadline I am extremely proud of the finished product even if the platforming is simple.
